channel.title: Max stat and Combat Level
channel.description: I was wondering how do you make it so that the combat level is 99 and the overall level is 126?

item.title: Max stat and Combat Level
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

[quote=“zoltanman, post:5, topic:144330”][quote author=Waffles!! link=topic=197886.msg1764177#msg1764177 date=1190086302]
NPC facing certain ways…I forget soz. Public boolean nonwild probably, or just something like nonwild, combat level is depended on the returns you put in there. Only effected by the max stat level. Not gonna be level 50 with all 99s
And you’re welcome.
[/quote]

It’s in the player class, you have to edit the combat formula.[/quote]
Curse you, truth teller!
Don’t want the kid to get confused.

Read full topic

item.title: Max stat and Combat Level

@Iggy1 wrote:

Thanks mate =) and do you know about the Combat Level part? or how to make safe areas? or how to make an NPC face a certain way?

Read full topic

item.title: Max stat and Combat Level
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

[code]public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return 99;
}[/code]

Find something like that and have the 99s in the same spot as above ^^^

Read full topic
